0.27.text: Have we got any Chase fans in?

4.06.text:
Those of you that've seen him
on the circuit will know

6.14.text:
he is a former doctor that'll definitely
tickle your funny bone.

10.11.text: Ladies and gentlemen, bring on the Chaser!

21.00.text:
Blimey, it's the Palladium.
Good evening!

25.20.text:
Now as you can imagine, when I decided
I wanted to pursue a career

27.97.text:
as a full-time stand-up comedian,
my parents -- thrilled for me.

32.75.text:
Absolutely delighted,
simply couldn't be happier.

35.90.text:
They ring me every day of my life
to tell me this:

38.69.text:
that when they arrived on this
beautiful island in 1968,

41.54.text:
it wasn't their dream come true,
that their only son had a British education

51.15.text:
That's right, 48 long years ago is when
my Mum and Dad made the same decision

55.68.text:
we now know half of India made.
Looked to the map of the world,

58.55.text:
went, "America, too exciting,
we're coming to Britain."

63.57.text:
Odd choice? No! Perfect choice.
I'll tell you why.

66.74.text:
1960s, there's your clue.
Here are the options:

75.51.text:
Forced to sit at the back of the bus;
get to drive the bus.

84.07.text:
Fairly natural choice,
I think you'll agree,

86.04.text:
and it's a choice that paid off for me,
'cause I've got another string to my bow:

89.15.text:
don't be too shocked by this, but in
addition to all this stuff going on,

92.12.text:
I'm officially an openly gay man.
[cheers from crowd]

98.28.text:
It's not a bad life, being the only
openly gay, British, Asian,

101.28.text:
qualified doctor and television quizzer
on the United Kingdom comedy circuit.

105.84.text:
So here's my chance. There's two and
a half thousand people here,

108.83.text:
at the London Palladium,
there's millions watching on telly,

111.41.text:
and now I'm gonna tell you
about my Mum and my Dad.

115.27.text:
They're brilliant.
They really, really are.

117.55.text: They're totally supportive about the whole thing.

119.58.text:
Even the gay thing, which was a surprise,
given that in their culture,

123.96.text: it's the worst thing you can be.

125.58.text: It's a status just below a leper,

127.48.text: and just above a gay leper.

139.82.text:
In 1968, when my Mum and Dad came here,
they came with ambitions to become British.

144.06.text:
Now they are British,
they face their biggest crisis:

146.17.text:
me coming out of the closet. I was
expecting anger, devastation, rejection.

150.92.text:
It's worse.
They're trying to arrange me a husband.

162.44.text:
It's a lovely sentiment on their part,
but the tragic news is,

165.76.text: I may actually need their help.

170.41.text:
In September 2015, after a four-year
relationship, I got dumped,

174.84.text:
and it's sad to say --
[crowd goes awwww]

176.00.text:
Thank you for that.
It's no help, but thank you anyway.

179.27.text:
It's sad to say that I'm now
a single, middle-aged, gay man,

183.17.text:
and I have to be optimistic
and positive and proactive,

186.29.text:
because I don't want to be miserable
about the whole thing.

189.33.text:
And I was very much inspired by this
dating channel I was watching the other day.

193.04.text:
Don't judge me.
I've already got Freeview.

195.37.text:
I was watching this dating channel,
and I saw this beautiful, exotic woman

201.94.text: "My Mum is half Welsh, half Nigerian,

205.24.text:
"and my Dad is half Peruvian,
half Azerbaijani,

208.97.text:
"and I'm looking for somebody from
a similar background to me."

213.92.text:
And as she said these words,
my first instinct was, "Proper insane."

218.27.text:
And then I changed my mind as I realised
she is someone who is trying her best.

223.55.text: So that is what made me vow to try my best.

226.25.text:
You'll be pleased to know,
as a result of trying my best,

228.20.text:
I've recently downloaded that new
smartphone app that gives you the location

232.25.text:
of all the single, middle-aged,
Asian men in your area.

244.14.text:
Ladies and gentlemen,
you've been gorgeous.

245.73.text:
I've been Paul Sinha. Thank you very much,
good night. Thank you!
